properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm; Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 10:44PM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary and Coastal waters from
Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
